definition: to flow/to disseminate/to circulate or spread/to move or drift/to degenerate/to banish or send into exile/stream of water or sth resembling one/class, rate or grade
to gather/to collect/collected works/classifier for sections of a TV series etc: episode
round/lump/ball/to roll into a ball/to gather/regiment/group/society/classifier for a lump or a soft mass: wad (of paper), ball (of wool), cloud (of smoke)

sentences.english: To date, but also as a rogue group singing the praises of the local community.
sentences.chinese: 時至今日，還要爲本土流氓集團歌功頌德。

sentences.english: Schools are serving increasingly as an arena for gang activity and violence.
sentences.chinese: 學校已逐漸變成流氓集團活動和發生暴亂的場所。

sentences.english: Ringleaders of hooligan groups shall be sentenced to fixed-term imprisonment of not less than seven years.
sentences.chinese: 流氓集團的首要分子，處七年以上有期徒刑。
